title: NICE: Non-linear Independent Components Estimation
excerpt: Abstract: We propose a deep learning framework for modeling complex high-dimensional densities via Non-linear Independent Component Estimation (NICE). It is based on the idea that a good representation is one in which the data has a distribution that is easy to model.  ...
